NOT A GZIPPED FILE: Incorrect file type: the file must be a compressed gzipped file (try the file command to check its real type). Maybe you forgot to include the z option when creating your tar archive?
PROFILE_EXPLANATION: Here you can find all profiles.
PROFILE_CREATION_DESCRIPTION: To create a profile, please enter the job, sector...
SELECT_A_PROFILE_DESCRIPTION: Select the profile that best corresponds to the sequence
ALMOST_FINISHED_DIALOG_MSG: You are almost done! If you want to confirm your changes and save to the database, click Save. Else you can continue editing or discard changes.
SEQUENCE_CREATION_DESCRIPTION: To start the creation of the new sequence, first click the pencil in the upper-right corner, then edit the sequence and save to create a new sequence.
NAME: Name
AUTHOR: Author
SESSION_REGISTER_ALERT_TITLE: You're about to register to a session
SESSION_REGISTER_ALERT_DESCRIPTION: Please confirm that you want to register to this session.
TEMP_STMT: Enter here the template statement for your exercise in HTML
CREATING_SESSION_DESCRIPTION: You are about to create a session
DELETING_SESSION_DESCRIPTION: You are about to delete a session
TIMED_SESSION: Each day only one exercise is available. First exercise is only available on start day, next exercise on next day and so on.
INSUFFICIENT_SCORE: Achieve a better score at previous exercise to unblock access
PASSWORD_RESET_EXPLANATION: In order to reset your password, please type the email address you used to register your account with just below. Once done, an email will be sent to it with a link to choose a new password.
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCESS: If an account was registered with this email, you will receive a mail on it
PASSWORD_RESET_FAILED: An error occured while trying to send a password reset request for your account
ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT_ERROR: We could not activate your account, this may be because your link has expired or an error occured. Please contact an administrator.
ACTIVATE_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS: Your account has been activated ! You can now log into it.
CHANGE_PASSWORD_ERROR: An error occured while changing your password
CHANGE_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: Your password has been changed with success ! You can now use it to log into your account
EXERCISES_THAT_ACQUIRED_SKILLS: The exercises you've done and passed that allowed you to acquire this skill
SESSION_TIMEZONE_WARNING: The timezone used by the dates and times displayed may differ from yours. We currently use the timezone
LOGIN_ERROR_DEFAULT_MESSAGE: An unknown error occured while trying to log you in. Please retry later.
REGISTER_BUSINESS_SESSIONS_FAILURE: We couldn't register you to this session. Check the session secret key you gave and try again.
BUSINESS_SESSIONS_ERROR: An error occured when saving the session. Check the information you gave and try again.
INDICATE_STUDENT_NUMBER: please indicate your student number if you have any
REGISTER_FORM_INSTRUCTOR_HELPTEXT: please contact us by email to shellonyou at polytech-reaseau dot org if you plan to create new activites or want to organize sessions for your studients.
REGISTER_PASSWORD_HELPERTEXT: We don't enforce rules for password composition but please choose a long enough password - a song name for instance - to provide security to your account (results, data, ...)
REGISTER_FORM_TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS: This site uses cookies (store on the browser) in order to authenticate users. The site collects data but in an anonymous way in order to improve the provided service. This anonymous data may also be used for pedagogical purposes. This data is not shared with third parties. Users may ask to correct or delete collected data by sending an email to shellonyou at polytech-reseau dot org
NEED_TO_AGREE: You have to agree to the
UPDATE_BUSINESS_SESSIONS_PARTIAL_WARN: Some information you provided were invalid. The session has only been partially updated.
NO_RESULTS_YET: The session has not received any response yet. Try again later.
SESSION_RESULTS_RETRIES_CHART: Number of student trials per exercise
SEQUENCE_MISSING_PROFILE_ERROR: You must specify a profile to save the sequence
NO_SKILLS: You haven't acquired any skill yet
STATEMENT_CREATION_SCRIPT_NEEDED: Please select a statement creation script
INFO_SCORE_CHART: The minimum, average and maximum score the students got in each exercise
INFO_RETRIES_CHART: The minimum, average and maximum number of submissions the students made in each exercise
USED_LIBRARY: This instance of ShellOnYou is using the library
BELONGING_THEME: Which theme do you think this exercise belongs to ?
FEELING_AFTER_EXERCISE: How do you feel after this exercise ?
FEEDBACK_MESSAGE: Your comments are very important to us. They help us to improve the content of the exercises and are therefore helpful to other students.
FEEDBACK_UPDATE_MESSAGE: You are currently updating your feedback for the selected exercise
FEEDBACK_CONGRATULATIONS_UPDATE_MESSAGE: Congratulations! You've reached the maximum score for this exercise. Would you mind taking your time to update your feedback if anything has changed?
FEEDBACK_CONGRATULATIONS_MESSAGE: Congratulations! You've reached the maximum score for this exercise. Would you mind taking your time to review this exercise?
BUSINESS_PROFILE_EXPLANATION_TEXT: These profiles are intended as jobs to train for. This might change the exercises you try on the platform (currently, each exercising session is attached to a profile).
GIVE_FOR_COMMEND: Your ID is {{id}}, you can indicate it to any student you've helped so they can give you credit!
PRESS_RETURN: Press Return to validate each user ID
RECOMMEND_TEXT: Did someone help you? You can thank another user here! For that just indicate their personal code, if you don't know it, ask them, they can know it from the question mark '?' icon at the top right of their 'Home' page.
SKILLS_LINKED: Skills linked to the current exercise:
EXERCISE_MAY_CHANGE: Beware. This exercise can be changed by its author, you might consider cloning this exercise to protect against changes by other instructors while one of your sessions is active.
